name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: ₹6000/year financial support to farmer families.

name: Ayushman Bharat (PMJAY)
description: ₹5 lakh health insurance for low income families.

name: PM Awas Yojana
description: Housing for All - financial assistance for home construction.

name: National Pension Scheme (APY)
description: Old age income security for unorganized sector workers.

name: PM Mudra Yojana
description: Loans up to ₹10 lakh for small businesses.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Savings scheme for girl child education and marriage.

name: PM Scholarship Scheme
description: Scholarship for children of ex-servicemen and police personnel.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance for farmers against natural calamities.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Guaranteed pension between ₹1000-₹5000 after 60 years.

name: PM Ujjwala Yojana
description: Free LPG connection to women from BPL families.

name: National Rural Livelihood Mission
description: Self-employment and skill development for rural poor.

name: PM Svanidhi Scheme
description: ₹10000 working capital loan for street vendors.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
description: Free bank account with ₹10000 overdraft facility.

name: Kisan Credit Card
description: Affordable credit for farmers' agricultural needs.

name: PM Matru Vandana Yojana
description: ₹5000 cash benefit for pregnant and lactating mothers.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme
description: Stipend support for apprentices in industries.

name: PM Vishwakarma Scheme
description: Support for artisans and craftspeople with training & credit.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: ₹2 lakh life insurance at ₹436/year premium.

name: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana
description: ₹2 lakh accident insurance at ₹12/year premium.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for SC/ST
description: Financial assistance for SC/ST students pursuing higher education.
